import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Point } from 'src/app/interfaces/point.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-points', templateUrl: './points.component.html', }) export class PointsComponent { @Input() points!: Point[]; @Input() double: boolean = false; }
